entry.title: [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Oracles, Bonds, and Attestation Chains
entry.summary: The post describes how covenants like CTV can improve on-chain bitcoin signing oracles by solving the timeout/rollover issue and miner/oracle collusion issue on punishment. The author also discusses a protocol that can make 'branch-free' attestation chains where equivocation results in burned funds. Additionally, various uses for these chained attestations are lightly touched upon. The author provides a link to Robin Linus's whitepaper which delves deeper into the concepts described in the post.
